VintageClaw.NAME: Vintage Claw
VintageClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

ClawAndTear.NAME: Claw and Tear
ClawAndTear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 2 times. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

ClawCell.NAME: Claw Cell
ClawCell.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable.  NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

ClawpileDriver.NAME: Clawpile Driver
ClawpileDriver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card for each unique Orb you have. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

ClawForTheEyes.NAME: Claw for the Eyes
ClawForTheEyes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

ClawingBeam.NAME: Clawing Beam
ClawingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw 1 card.  NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

ClawAndGloom.NAME: Claw and Gloom
ClawAndGloom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel 1 Dark. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

ClawForOne.NAME: Claw for One
ClawForOne.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put all Cost 0 cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

ClawLightning.NAME: Claw Lightning
ClawLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel 1 Lightning. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawline.NAME: Clawline
Clawline.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play this card, reduce its cost by 1 for this combat. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawrage.NAME: Clawrage
Clawrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Channeled Orb. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawseye.NAME: Clawseye
Clawseye.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1(2) Lock-On. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

ClawSnap.NAME: Claw Snap
ClawSnap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawter.NAME: Clawter
Clawter.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from an enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawzard.NAME: Clawzard
Clawzard.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !D! times the Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

FTC.NAME: FTC
FTC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have played less than 3(4) cards this turn, draw 1 card. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Sclawrape.NAME: Sclawrape
Sclawrape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw !M! cards. Discard all cards drawn this way that do not cost 0. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.
